content: Daylight Saving Time is coming this weekend! It has purported that we lose an hours sleep when we move our clocks ahead and we gain an hour when we go back to regular time. Personally, it does not affect me! I average 6 hours sleep at night! This message has been edited. content: quote: Personally, it does not affect me! I average 6 hours sleep at night! Bruce, how dare you get that much sleep, My doctors will be happy if I could get four hours of good sleep a night. I've only average about that much (and not good sleep) for the last 41 years. Take care friend, Bruce Bruce A listening ear, a caring heart, an open mind and an extend hand may be all I can offer, but they are yours without charge or judgment.

content: 24. For extra credit: Johnny has 47.73 hours of saved daylight from the last 4 years. Suzie has 5867 rollover minutes on her Verizon account. Mike just got a job at Pep Boys that pays $7.85 per hour. If Mike works for 2 months part-time 3 days a week and Suzie trades her rollover minutes for a new i-phone will Johnny be any brighter in August?

content: We started Sunday off ok, wasn't late for church. This morning, I woke up looked at the clock.
